Chips are getting tighter as Ante 3 approaches. My core strength lies in Three of a Kind synergy with Zany Joker, while Sock and Buskin amplifies face card plays. The Wrathful Joker provides conditional boosts depending on spade composition, though it's less reliable than my primary combo.

Business Card feels expendable since it only generates money—I need raw scoring power more urgently. Abstract Joker's flat +15 mult would be a solid replacement.

Looking at available purchases, The Hanged Man offers deck thinning but won't immediately boost scores. Marble Joker is more compelling: it generates Stone cards worth +50 chips each when blinds are selected, and since they lack rank or suit, they won't interfere with hand formation while still contributing to my chip total.

Telescope at $10 is pricey but guarantees a Three of a Kind planet upgrade, which matters since that's my most-played hand at level 1. Arcana Pack could provide useful card modifications for $4, or I could reroll for $5 to find better options. With $23 available and maxed joker slots, I'd need to sell something before buying Marble Joker. The real question is whether to invest in Telescope now for long-term scaling or grab cheaper immediate upgrades. would leave me with $19 total. However, Stone cards from Marble Joker could complicate hand formation since they lack rank and suit properties.

I'm convinced the **Telescope** voucher is the better choice—it's a permanent upgrade that directly supports my most-played hand, and with Zany Joker multiplying Three of a Kind hands by 12, leveling this hand consistently will pay dividends in later Antes. After spending $10, I'd have $13 remaining, enough for an Arcana Pack to grab useful tarot enhancements.

# Available Commands
The possible commands in Balatro are all composed of a single word specifying the action, followed by any necessary positional arguments, which are lists of integers.
Note: all position arguments are 1-indexed.

The following commands are available in your current game state.
use_consumable <consumeable_position> <target_card_position1> <target_card_position2> ... <target_card_positionN> - Use a consumeable from the consumeables section. The first position argument is the position within your consumables inventory of the consumable you'd like to use. Subsequent position arguments specify the cards in hand that the consumeable will be used on, if that consumeable requires targets.
sell_consumable <consumeable_position> - Sell a consumeable from the consumeables section.
rearrange_jokers <joker1> <joker2> ... <jokerN> - Rearrange the list of currently owned jokers. Every index in the list of current jokers must be present, i.e. if there are 5 jokers, the indices 1-5 must be present.
sell_joker <joker_position> - Sell a joker from the jokers section.
buy_card <card_position> - Buy a card from the card section. Individual Joker cards are also bought from the card section.
buy_booster <booster_pack_position> - Buy a booster pack from the booster pack section.
buy_voucher <voucher_position> - Buy a voucher from the voucher section.
buy_and_use_consumable <consumable_position> - Buy a consumable type card (Tarot, Planet, Spectral) from the card section and use it immediately. Cannot do this if the consumable requires target hand cards.
round_select - Finish shopping and go to the round select screen.
reroll_shop - Spends the reroll cost to reroll the cards section of the shop.
